item.title: LochNAS Folder Structure
item.description: See folder tree in table of contents /lochnas/> /lochnas/ # Path to the root of the lochnas folder. This should live in the root folder of the server. We no longer support dynamic paths so that the containers can refference the same root paths internally and reduce user confusion.
